actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38 of the United States Code to restore entitlement to educational benefits to veterans of World War II and the Korean conflict.

summary.text: Entitles educational benefits to veterans of World War II and the Korean conflict who received such education or training for for a period less than that which he was entitled to. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1651-52, 1661(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38 of the United States Code to restore entitlement to educational benefits to veterans of World War II and the Korean conflict.
